title: Strong and safe
brief_description: A program focusing on IV users and HIV issues in the prison environment. Presents information on cleaning needles/syringes, obtaining new needles and syringes, and safe sexual practices by using humorous narrators - “Bleachman” and “Condomware Woman”! Messages are promoted in a positive, simple and practical manner and are geared to reinforcing safe injecting and sexual practices as they relate to IV drug use and the potential transmission of HIV within a prison oriented context.
